alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Coastal Bay; Inland Bay; Inland Gulf; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 8:51PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Gulf, east central Bay, Calhoun Counties in the Panhandle of Florida and Liberty Counties in Big Bend of Florida through 945 PM EDT/845 PM CDT/... At 851 PM EDT/751 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northeast of Blountstown to 14 miles north of Stonemill Creek to 15 miles northeast of Callaway. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Blountstown, Stonemill Creek, Orange, Wewahitchka, Bristol, Honeyville, Jewel Fire Tower, Selman, Abe Springs, Vilas, Chipola Cutoff, Hosford, Jensen Place, Central City, Red Hill, Clio, Scotts Ferry, Kennys Mill, Estiffanulga and Kern. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Coastal Bay; Inland Bay; Inland Gulf; Liberty
